about: Auli, the place blessed by snow is too good to be put in words. The Auli palce is known for skiing more than anything else. It comes in Chamoli district of Uttarakhand district and at a height of nearly 3000 metres with a vertical drop of 500 metres. While skiing might be more a popular reason for coming to Auli, the place is not devoid of other tourist attractions. Auli is the kind of place where pleasure and adventure, wild beauty and slopes of snow field, nature's beauty in its best form comes alive. What makes a trip to Auli so fulfilling and interesting is the fact that the place is flanked by some interesting places to visit in Auli and nearby. One can just stay in Auli Himachal Pradesh, enjoy the skiing and to take a break, just visit any of the nearby paces, like Joshimath, just 16 kilometres. Even the young honeymooners plan their honeymoon in Auli to adore its beauty. That is why these days so many tourism hotels in Auli has been opened by the government.

itinerary.title: Haridwar - Auli
activities: Early morning pick-up from Haridwar Railway Station / Dehradun Airport (around 08:00 hrs).
Drive towards Auli, enjoying the scenic route via Devprayag and Rudraprayag.
On arrival, check in at your resort.
Relax and soak in the refreshing mountain weather.
Overnight stay at Auli.

itinerary.title: Explore Auli
activities: After breakfast at the resort, proceed to Auli Ropeway (cable car charges extra, payable directly).
Enjoy a breathtaking ride offering panoramic views of the snow-clad Himalayas, oak forests, and alpine meadows.
Spend the entire day exploring the beauty of Auli - a paradise for nature lovers and adventure seekers.
Return to the resort by evening and relax.
Overnight stay at Auli.

itinerary.title: Auli - Haridwar
activities: After breakfast, check out from the resort.
Drive back towards Haridwar / Dehradun.
Drop at Railway Station / Airport for your onward journey.
Tour ends with sweet & unforgettable memories of Auli!

inclusions: Transport from Haridwar to Haridwar by Indigo (02-03 Pax) / Innova (04-06 Pax) / Tempo Traveller (07-10 Pax)

tourName: Valley of Flowers Trek with Auli & Joshimath
about: The Valley of Flowers National Park in Uttarakhand is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, renowned for its breathtaking alpine meadows and vibrant blossoms. Nestled in the Garhwal Himalayas, this enchanting valley is carpeted with a diverse range of rare and endemic flora, making it a paradise for nature lovers, trekkers, and photographers. Apart from its floral beauty, the Valley of Flowers trek also offers a chance to spot rare wildlife like the Asiatic black bear, musk deer, red fox, blue sheep, brown bear, and even the elusive snow leopard. Flowing streams, floral pastures, and majestic mountain backdrops add to its magical charm. According to legends, this is the mystical land from where Hanuman collected the Sanjeevani booti to save Lakshmana in the epic Ramayana. Today, the Valley of Flowers stands as one of the most sought-after trekking destinations in India, combining natural beauty, adventure, and spiritual significance.

itinerary.title: Dehradun - Joshimath
activities: Arrival at Dehradun Airport/Railway Station
Drive to Joshimath and check-in at the hotel
Visit Narsingh Temple, winter seat of Lord Badrinath
Learn about Jyotirmath established by Adi Guru Shankaracharya
Overnight stay at Joshimath

itinerary.title: Joshimath - Auli - Joshimath
activities: Breakfast at the hotel
Take the ropeway to Auli (at own cost)
Option for skiing in Auli (at own cost)
Attend cultural programs showcasing Uttarakhand heritage
Return to Joshimath and check-in at hotel
Overnight stay at Joshimath

itinerary.title: Joshimath - Govindghat - Ghangaria (Trek: 14 km / ~6 hrs)
activities: Breakfast at hotel
Drive to Govindghat, trek starting point
Begin 14 km trek on a pilgrim trail
Reach Ghangaria, base camp for Valley of Flowers
Check-in at guesthouse
Overnight stay at Ghangaria

itinerary.title: Ghangaria - Valley of Flowers - Ghangaria (Trek: 5 km one way)
activities: Breakfast at Ghangaria
Trek 5 km to Valley of Flowers (3,858 m)
See rare flora like Brahma Kamal and multicolored wildflowers
Enjoy views of Nilgiri Parbat (6,474 m) and snow-clad peaks
Explore valley divided by Pushpawati Stream
Return trek to Ghangaria
Overnight stay at Ghangaria

itinerary.title: Ghangaria - Govindghat - Rudraprayag
activities: Breakfast at Ghangaria
Trek back to Govindghat
Drive to Rudraprayag
Check-in at hotel
Overnight stay at Rudraprayag

itinerary.title: Rudraprayag - Rishikesh - Dehradun (Departure)
activities: Breakfast at hotel
Drive towards Dehradun via Rishikesh
Enroute sightseeing: Ram Jhula, Laxman Jhula, and famous Ashrams
Continue to Dehradun Airport for onward flight

tourName: Rishikesh River Rafting & Bungee Jumping Package
about: Known as both the Yoga Capital of the World and the Adventure Capital of India, Rishikesh offers the perfect blend of thrill and nature. This 2 Days / 1 Night Rishikesh Adventure Package includes the most popular activities – river rafting in Rishikesh, bungee jumping, zipline, camping, kayaking, and canoeing. Whether you're seeking adrenaline-pumping sports or a relaxing night under the stars, this package is designed for adventure lovers and group travelers alike. Directly book your Rishikesh adventure tour with Explore Case for an unforgettable experience in the lap of the Himalayas

itinerary.title: Arrival - River Rafting - Camp Stay
activities: Arrive at the camp in Rishikesh and check in
Freshen up and enjoy lunch
Attend safety briefing & rafting technique session with instructors
Rafting expedition on the Ganges from Shivpuri to Ram Jhula / NIM Beach
Experience rapids like Roller Coaster, Golf Course, and Club House
Evening bonfire & music followed by dinner
Overnight stay at the riverside camp

itinerary.title: Bungee Jumping - Departure
activities: Breakfast at the camp
Proceed for Bungee Jumping from 83 meters height
Experience the thrill of free fall
Trip concludes with adventure-filled memories

inclusions: Accommodation on sharing basis at the campsite
All meals: Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner with evening snacks & tea
River Rafting (9 km stretch) on the Ganges

about: Jim Corbett Corporate Group Packages from Delhi - Experience the perfect blend of adventure and relaxation with jungle safari tours, wildlife spotting, team outings, and comfortable stays near Jim Corbett National Park. Ideal for corporate trips, family groups, and friends looking for a nature retreat.

itinerary.title: Delhi - Jim Corbett National Park (250 km | ~6 hrs drive)
activities: Depart from Delhi for Jim Corbett National Park
Check in at the hotel/resort and relax
After lunch visit Garjiya Devi Temple
Visit Corbett Waterfall (Tiger Fall)
Return to the hotel in the evening
Dinner and overnight stay at the resort

itinerary.title: Jim Corbett Wildlife Safari & Adventure
activities: Early morning Jeep Safari inside Jim Corbett National Park
Spot wildlife including tigers, leopards, elephants, deer, and birds (e.g., Blossom-headed Parakeet, Crested Serpent Eagle, Red Junglefowl)
Optional Elephant Safari (extra cost)
Evening relaxation and bonfire with dinner
Overnight stay at the resort

itinerary.title: Jim Corbett - Delhi (250 km | ~6 hrs drive)
activities: Breakfast at the resort
Check out and drive back to Delhi
Arrive in Delhi by evening

about: Explore Case specializes in customized Chopta tour packages for travelers seeking the “Mini Switzerland of Uttarakhand.” Nestled in the Garhwal Himalayas, Chopta is the starting point for the famous Tungnath and Chandrashila trek, known for breathtaking sunrises and panoramic views of Nanda Devi, Trishul, and Chaukhamba peaks. Our packages include comfortable camping, guided trekking, cab services, and local experiences so you can enjoy Chopta’s serene meadows and pristine landscapes. At Explore Case, we blend adventure with comfort, making your Chopta journey a perfect mix of spirituality, thrill, and nature's charm.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Check-in
activities: Arrive at Chopta, often called the Mini Switzerland of Uttarakhand.
Check into your scenic campsite surrounded by lush meadows and breathtaking Himalayan landscapes.
Spend the evening relaxing in the refreshing mountain air.
Enjoy a hearty dinner and an overnight stay at the camp.

itinerary.title: Tungnath Temple & Chandrashila Trek
activities: Begin an early morning trek to Tungnath Temple, the highest Shiva temple in the world, and continue towards Chandrashila Peak.
The 4-hour journey takes you through enchanting forests and meadows.
From the summit, witness a spectacular 360-degree view of the Himalayas, including Nanda Devi, Trishul, and Chaukhamba peaks.
Trek back to Chopta by evening, followed by dinner and a peaceful overnight stay at the camp.

itinerary.title: Departure from Chopta
activities: After breakfast, bid farewell to Chopta.
Begin your return journey with unforgettable memories of this spiritual and adventurous Himalayan experience.

inclusions: Accommodation on a sharing basis in scenic camps.
Meals: Breakfast, Dinner, and evening tea.
Trek to Tungnath Temple and Chandrashila Summit with guided support.
exclusions: Any transport services to/from Chopta.

about: At Explore Case, we bring you the untouched beauty of Harsil - the hidden gem of Uttarakhand. Surrounded by apple orchards, snow-clad peaks, and the gushing Bhagirathi River, our Harsil tour packages are designed for nature lovers, adventure seekers, and those looking for peace away from crowded tourist spots. From scenic treks to nearby villages, riverside stays, and soulful Himalayan experiences, we provide curated itineraries, comfortable stays, and smooth transportation. With our expertise in Uttarakhand tourism, Explore Case ensures your Harsil trip is memorable, authentic, and hassle-free.

itinerary.title: Check-in at Hotel
activities: Welcome drink on arrival at the hotel in Uttarkashi.
Enjoy lunch after check-in formalities.
Guided tour to Mukhwa (winter home of Goddess Gangotri) and Bagori Village (traditional sheep herders’ village).
Evening relaxation with hot tea/coffee.
Dinner and overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.title: Sattal & Nelang Valley Excursion
activities: Breakfast at the hotel.
Moderate 2 km hike to Sattal, enjoying Himalayan landscapes.
Visit Nelang Valley, known for its Tibet & Spiti-like terrain.
Return to hotel by evening for dinner and overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Early morning sunrise view from the lake.
Breakfast at the hotel.
Departure to onward destination with memorable experiences.
